title: I forgot my email and it wont let me reset my password
body: hi guys i cant access my league account anymore. i had to re install and usually i can log in using my password but it made me change my password and when i try to change it it says password incorrect even though i use that pass every day. so i tried changing the email i used for that account but i dont know that email anymore because its a really old email i forgot it all! so the problem is i cant change my pass and i cant recover it because i dont know my email for the account someone please help me! i cannot lose this account!

replies.body:
Best bet is to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can help you further.  A part of the account recovery process is sharing information about the account that shouldn't be discussed in a public board.

Basically, we just need to make sure you're the owner of the account before we change the e-mail listed on the account.  Let me know if you run into any issues!
